snippet: The dollar took a break from a surge that has held back stocks and boded ill for American exporters. Meanwhile, attention focused on this week’s Fed meeting.
abstract: Stocks rise as dollar's rally against euro eases.
lead_paragraph: The dollar took a break from a surge that has held back stocks and boded ill for American exporters. Meanwhile, attention focused on this week’s Fed meeting.

headline.main: Market Rebounds as Dollar Settles and Eyes Turn to the Fed
headline.print_headline: Market Rebounds as Dollar Settles and Eyes Turn to the Fed
